entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:42 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kemptville

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
